QUEEN FLORA

Handmade Long Silk Dress
$580.92$637.92
Size Guide
Available colours:
ADD TO SHOPPING BAGAdded TO SHOPPING BAG
ADD TO WISHLIST

Girls handmade long length dress by Aristocrat Kids. Made from gorgeous soft, lightweight silk satin with colourful flowers and birds on a very dark green background. The fitted bodice has mother of pearl buttons to fasten, three quarter length sleeves and a sash to tie at the back. The full skirt has gathers around the waist to give a floaty feel and is lined with smooth cotton. A pretty and comfortable dress ideal for special occasions.

  • Product number 146976
  • 100% silk (lightweight satin feel)
  • Lining: 100% cotton (smooth feel)
  • Dry clean
  • Button fastenings at the back
  • Sash to tie on the waist
  • Long length
  • ¾ length sleeves
  • Handmade
  • Style name: 'Queen Flora'
  • Comes with a fabric bag
  • SHOP WITH THIS DRESS
  • HELP WITH SIZE
  • DELIVERY & RETURNS
